mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prj_post_memo (post_no, content, account) VALUES (#{postNo}, #{content}, #{account})
mapper.update: UPDATE prj_post_memo SET content = #{content}, mod_datetime = current_timestamp WHERE memo_no = #{memoNo}
mapper.select: SELECT post_no, memo_no, content, account, reg_datetime, mod_datetime FROM prj_post_memo WHERE post_no = #{postNo} ORDER BY mod_datetime DESC

SELECT post_no, memo_no, content, account, reg_datetime, mod_datetime FROM prj_post_memo WHERE 1=1 AND post_no = #{postNo} AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search.keyword}, '%') ORDER BY mod_datetime DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PM.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT post_no, memo_no, content, account, reg_datetime, mod_datetime FROM prj_post_memo WHERE 1=1 AND post_no = #{postNo} ORDER BY mod_datetime DESC LIMIT 9999999999 ) AS PM, (select @rownum := 0) AS R ) AS PPM WHERE RNUM > 2
